structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.catch_line: Database update by Department of Juvenile Justice.
law.text:
The Department of Juvenile Justice shall update its database within thirty (30) days of receipt of information. The update shall include information from the:
Offender records;
Institutional records; and
Administrative records.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1998.
